helptext_DEFAULT_MIDIBANK_IDX: Default: 3. Index for the default MIDI bank.
helptext_MIDI_NOTES_LIMIT: Default: 50. Maximum limit for MIDI notes. Chg with care.
helptext_NAV_BUTTONS_POLL_S: Default: 1. Polling interval for navigation buttons in seconds.
helptext_BUTTON_HOLD_THRESH_S: Default: 0.5. Threshold duration for considering a button as held in seconds.
helptext_DBL_PRESS_THRESH_S: Default: 0.4. Threshold duration for considering a double press in seconds.
helptext_NOTIFICATION_THRESH_S: Default: 0.5. Threshold duration for displaying notifications in seconds.
helptext_DISPLAY_NOTIFICATION_METERING_T: Default: 0.08. Threshold for displaying metering notifications.
